C

com.encoway.edu - package com.encoway.edu
Event Driven Updates (EDU) helps decoupling components of AJAX heavy JSF UIs.

E

EVENT_CONTEXT_PARAM - Static variable in class com.encoway.edu.EventDrivenUpdatesContext
Name of the context-param to override the context bean name, defaults to "eduContext".
EventDrivenUpdatesContext - Class in com.encoway.edu
EDU context of the a JSF application.
EventDrivenUpdatesListener - Class in com.encoway.edu
SystemEventListener mapping event names to registered UIComponent’s IDs.
EventDrivenUpdatesListener() - Constructor for class com.encoway.edu.EventDrivenUpdatesListener
Initializes a EventDrivenUpdatesListener configured through the external context.
EventDrivenUpdatesListener(String, EventListenerMapELResolver) - Constructor for class com.encoway.edu.EventDrivenUpdatesListener
Initializes a EventDrivenUpdatesListener with the specified attribute name and resolver.
EVENTS_ATTRIBUTE_DEFAULT_NAME - Static variable in class com.encoway.edu.EventDrivenUpdatesListener
Default value.
EVENTS_ATTRIBUTE_PARAM - Static variable in class com.encoway.edu.EventDrivenUpdatesListener
Name of the context-param to override the listener attribute, defaults to "updateOn".
EVNT_CONTEXT_DEFAULT_NAME - Static variable in class com.encoway.edu.EventDrivenUpdatesContext
Default value.

G

getCurrentInstance() - Static method in class com.encoway.edu.EventDrivenUpdatesContext
Returns the instance of EventDrivenUpdatesContext associated with the current Application.
